nl.esciencecenter.esight.swing

Class GoggleSwing

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.swing.GoggleSwing

  • public class GoggleSwing
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for various static Swing components, for use in GUIs.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GoggleSwing.ButtonBoxItem
      A single item for a ButtonBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.buttonBox()
      static class  GoggleSwing.CheckBoxItem
      A single item for a CheckBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.checkboxBox()
      static class  GoggleSwing.ColoredCheckBoxItem
      A single item for a LegendBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.legendBox()
      static class  GoggleSwing.DropdownBoxesBoxItem
      A single item for a DropdownBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.dropdownBox()
      static class  GoggleSwing.DropdownBoxItem
      A single item for a DropdownBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.dropdownBox()
      static class  GoggleSwing.RadioBoxItem
      A single item for a RadioBox, to be used in conjuction with GoggleSwing.radioBox()

      • sliderBox

        public static javax.swing.Box sliderBox(java.lang.String label,
                        javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener,
                        int min,
                        int max,
                        int spacing,
                        int norm,
                        javax.swing.JLabel dynamicLabel)
        A box containing a single horizontal slider with Integer values.
        Parameters:
        label - The name and label of this box.
        listener - The listener to be associated with the slider.
        min - The minimum value on the slider.
        max - The maximum value on the slider.
        spacing - The spacing of the ticks on the slider.
        norm - The initial setting for the slider.
        dynamicLabel - The JLabel to set when the slider value changes.
        Returns:
        the Box containing the slider.

      • sliderBox

        public static javax.swing.Box sliderBox(java.lang.String label,
                        javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener,

                        float fmax,
                        float fspacing,
                        float fnorm,
                        javax.swing.JLabel dynamicLabel)
        A box containing a single horizontal slider with Float values.
        Parameters:
        label - The name and label of this box.
        listener - The listener to be associated with the slider.
        fmin - The minimum value on the slider.
        fmax - The maximum value on the slider.
        fspacing - The spacing of the ticks on the slider.
        fnorm - The initial setting for the slider.
        dynamicLabel - The JLabel to set when the slider value changes.
        Returns:
        the Box containing the slider.
